title: Daily Market Snapshot
content: The Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, down -27.40 points to 19799.85, a move of  -0.14%. On a point basis, the blue-chip index traded in its narrowest daily range in three years. The S&P 500 SPX, edged -6.11 points lower to 2265.20, a move of -0.27%, while the Nasdaq Composite Index COMP, tacked on -0.04%, or -2.39 points, to 5552.94.
